content.raw:
Thanks for the new scoring script. It is nice to work with.

Still have not quite answered my question, the script scores on 3 frames , upperNeckPitchLink, head and inverse head.  Which is the one our solution should target?  Or are any of them valid? 

The pull request implies that any of them are valid for the answer, Just seeking direct confirmation of that.

thanks
-aric
